body:
Hey guys here is my second video and second montage, i hope you like it :).
If you have any tips just tell me.
If you like my videos comment, like or even subscribe.
Anyway here it is:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ur5OEyvhmn0
Thanks,
Matt

replies.body: Good montage man! Although there is only one aspect that I find annoying... it's the watermark of the recording software "Action". There are plenty of free recording software which don't have any watermarks! C:
